article_title: IRS Delays FATCA To Help Banks, But Offshore Account Disclosures Continue

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: FATCA roots out American account holders in financial institutions worldwide. The U.S. is giving foreign institutions more time to turn over Americans, but the law continues like a juggernaut.
og.title: IRS Delays FATCA To Help Banks, But Offshore Account Disclosures Continue
